guild_sand_table.tips_guild_land_score:
Guild Grid Points
1. Obtained during settlement round based on various types of grids.
2. Bonus points are provided by blessings during the scoring phase.
3. Guild construction production during each round of Royal City settlement.
4. Guild ranking rewards for Supremacy.
guild_sand_table.tips_member_contribution:
Personal Contribution
Sources:
1. Team participation in settlement round
2. Team participation in battle
3. Blessings
4. Complete City Construction donation quests.

guild_sand_table.link_add_des_1101:
The current structure is blessed by the Valkyrie.
1. When battling Defenders or the Shadow Tribe, if there are three or more Mystifiers in the team comp, the damage taken is reduced by half.
2. Your guild gains bonus grid points when ranking 1st in Favor of the Mystifiers synergy.

guild_sand_table.room_des_1: Genesis Forest is the origin of the Clash Domain, surrounded by dense forests and a mysterious atmosphere. This is the starting area for new guilds, providing abundant quests and exploration opportunities. Players can learn basic operations, collect resources, and interact with other guilds here.
guild_sand_table.room_des_2: Venture Land is a vast and diverse region that includes various terrains and creatures. From tranquil meadows to rugged mountains, players can embark on adventures and exploration here. Many puzzles are hidden in this area, awaiting discovery by players.
guild_sand_table.room_des_3: Frontier Clash is a hotly contested area where various forces vie for control. Numerous players engage in battles here, making it a battlefield for guilds to compete for territory and resources.
guild_sand_table.room_des_4: Ancient Ruins is an ancient and mysterious place filled with remnants of ancient civilizations and treasures. Players need to explore carefully to obtain valuable treasures. However, this place also harbors dangers and curses, requiring players to handle with caution.
guild_sand_table.room_des_5: Infernal Arena is a place engulfed in raging flames, surrounded by various dangerous environments. It is a persistent battlefield where players engage in battles with members of other guilds.
guild_sand_table.room_des_6: Wasteland is a desolate and dangerous place filled with various monsters. Players need to bravely battle against them. Additionally, players can enhance their abilities to face the challenges here.

guild_sand_table.note_spoil_des_1:
1. The Royal City produces building resources every round, and the output can be increased after upgrading.
2. The team can receive loot rewards after each round of battle.
3. Additional rewards can be obtained after winning the battle.
guild_sand_table.tips_spoil_award_null: Rewards will be updated after the settlement.
guild_sand_table.tips_log_view_limitation: View logs from the last 7 days only
guild_sand_table.blessing_level_des_1_1:
Guild points for all occupied grids increase by <color=@000083>2%</color> during settlement.
(effective after accumulating <color=@000083>5</color> blessings).
guild_sand_table.task_2315001: Join a battle against Grid Defenders [0] time(s)
guild_sand_table.note_spoil_des_2: No teams have been dispatched this round
guild_sand_table.tips_spoil_award:
1. The Royal City produces building resources every round, and the output can be increased after upgrading.
2. After dispatching teams each round, wait for the settlement to receive loot rewards.
3. If the team wins during the settlement, additional rewards will be granted.
4. If the current rewards are unclaimed, they can be accumulated and collected in subsequent rounds.

guild_sand_table.note_first_occupy_award_des: The guild that first occupies receives the following rewards for all its members
guild_sand_table.tips_first_occupy_award_des:
1. Rewards are sent out via mail.
2. Only players who have been in the guild for more than 7 days are eligible to receive rewards.
guild_sand_table.tips_morale_des:
The farther a team is from its guild's Royal City, the lower the morale, affecting the team's battle effects.
Distance <color=@000083>0-4</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>100</color> - no impact on battle effects
Distance <color=@000083>5-9</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>90</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>90%</color>
Distance <color=@000083>10-14</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>80</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>80%</color>
Distance <color=@000083>15-19</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>70</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>70%</color>
Distance <color=@000083>20-24</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>60</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>60%</color>
Distance <color=@000083>25-29</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>50</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>50%</color>
Distance <color=@000083>30-34</color> grids: Morale <color=@000083>40</color> - team damage is reduced to <color=@000083>40%</color> less damage.

guild_sand_table.note_guild_build_des_1: Generate grid points for the guild every round.
guild_sand_table.note_guild_build_des_2: Generate wood for all members every round.
guild_sand_table.note_guild_build_des_3: Generate stone for all members every round.
guild_sand_table.note_guild_build_des_4: Generate iron for all members every round.
guild_sand_table.tips_workshop_commission_des:
1. The higher the hero's star level, the higher the production bonus provided.
2. Different Valkyrie synergies provide higher production bonuses for heroes deployed in suitable workshops.
3. Heroes deployed in workshops provide production bonuses to themselves and the guild, but they cannot participate in battles.
guild_sand_table.tips_workshop_commission_num:
Heroes deployed in workshops provide production bonuses for themselves.
The guild currently has <color=@000083>{0}</color> heroes deployed in workshops, including my <color=@000083>{1}</color> heroes.

guild_sand_table.room_note_7: Guilds in the Supremacy tier have priority allocation here.
guild_sand_table.room_des_7: The Wasteland is a desolate and dangerous place, teeming with various monsters that players must bravely battle. Additionally, players can strengthen their abilities to confront the challenges of this wasteland.
guild_sand_table.note_arena_help_des:
1. Only interactions with other guilds are allowed.
2. Every time Supremacy opens, <color=@000083>3</color> interaction chances are added. The count resets after the current round of Clash Domain ends.
3. Based on the number of interactions, the corresponding guild teams will receive bonus effects in the current Supremacy.
guild_sand_table.tips_arena_personal_team_filled: Each player can only dispatch up to 2 teams
guild_sand_table.note_next_arena: Conditions for the next Supremacy to open (Count: {0})

The current structure is blessed by the Valkyrie.

guild_sand_table.note_arena_team_null: Only administrators can dispatch teams for Supremacy
guild_sand_table.note_arena_cheer_des:
Cheer
Mock Points = Cheers - Mock
When Mock Points are above 0, positive effects are gained.
When Mock Points are below 0, negative effects are gained.
guild_sand_table.note_arena_boo_des:
Mock
Cheer Points = Cheers - Mock
When Cheer Points are above 0, positive effects are gained.
When Cheer Points are below 0, negative effects are gained.
guild_sand_table.tips_arena_empty: No Supremacy battles occurred in the current room
guild_sand_table.tips_arena_victory_num: The total number of wins for this guild's members in the current Supremacy
guild_sand_table.tips_arena_rank_none: No ranking information for the current Supremacy
guild_sand_table.arena_popularity_des_0:
In Supremacy battles, heroes' ATK, DEF, and HP remain constant.
Cheer Score = Cheer-Mock, takes effect when equal to 0
guild_sand_table.arena_popularity_des_1:
In Supremacy battles, heroes' ATK, DEF, and HP increase by <color=@000083>[0]%</color>.

Cheer Score = Cheer-Mock, takes effect when between <color=@000083>[1]-[2]</color>
guild_sand_table.arena_popularity_des_2:
In Supremacy battles, heroes' ATK, DEF, and HP decrease by <color=@000084>[0]%</color>.

Cheer Score = Cheer-Mock, takes effect when between <color=@000084>[1]-[2]</color>
guild_sand_table.arena_link_buff_des: DMG Boost +50% and DMG RED +33% in Supremacy for heroes with the corresponding synergy during battle.
guild_sand_table.note_arena_target_des: Compete in the Supremacy rankings to earn grid points!

guild_sand_table.tips_build_break_des: Monsters are attacking the Royal City due to not being defeated in time. The city is damaged. Defeat the monsters to end this state.
guild_sand_table.tips_guild_morale_add: Monsters have been successfully defeated. In the current round, the Morale of guild teams is increased.
guild_sand_table.tips_guilld_morale_reduce: The Royal City is in a Damaged state due to monster attacks. The Morale of guild teams is reduced.

guild_sand_table.tip_gst_settlement_unable_ore: The results of the current round are being tallied. Unable to check the fountain details.
guild_sand_table.note_fort_ore_num_des:
After the guild occupies a fountain, members can mine the springs within it.
(<color=@000083>{0}/{1}</color>: <color=@000083>{0}</color> spring(s) are currently being mined, with a maximum of <color=@000083>{1}</color> allowed to be mined simultaneously.)
guild_sand_table.tips_guild_not_occupy_fort: The guild must occupy the fountain before mining the springs here.
guild_sand_table.tips_fort_ore_queuing: Level up Clash Techs to increase the mining limit.
guild_sand_table.note_fort_guild_not_occupy: The guild must occupy the fountain before mining the springs here.
guild_sand_table.tips_home_ore_level_des:
Current max level of Royal City Fountains: {0}
(Max level will increase to {2} after {1})
guild_sand_table.tips_home_ore_level_max: This fountain is at max level and no longer requires further upgrades.
guild_sand_table.tips_home_ore_bubble: The Royal City Fountain has reached its max level.
guild_sand_table.tips_fort_ore_bubble_1: Join Clash Domain to occupy more fountains!
guild_sand_table.tips_fort_ore_bubble_2: Join Clash Domain to occupy more higher-level fountains!
guild_sand_table.tips_ore_help_list_too_little: Too few members in the list. Rally your guild members to mine the springs!
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_share_confirm_des:
Share the assistance message in the guild chat?
Once shared, guild members can click the message to assist with the spring.
guild_sand_table.tips_ore_help_share_cd: Sharing is on cooldown. Please try again in 1 minute.
guild_sand_table.tips_ore_quick_challenge_des: The sweep will be settled based on the current highest damage.
guild_sand_table.tips_not_ore_quick_challenge: Please complete a challenge before starting a sweep.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_owner_show_rap: Hey, I'm mining this spring. Come help me out!
guild_sand_table.tips_no_record_quick_challenge: No damage data available; unable to perform Quick Assist.
guild_sand_table.note_spoil_des_6:
1. Gain Fountain Essence every round based on the mining progress.
2. The Royal City produces building resources every round, and the output can be increased after upgrading.
3. The team can receive loot rewards after each round of battle.
4. Additional rewards can be obtained after winning the battle.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_bubble_des_1: Your guild has leveled up its Clash Tech, and you can now mine more springs!
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_bubble_des_2: Your guild has occupied a new fountain containing higher-level springs. Head over to mine them and increase yield!
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_bubble_des_3: Oh no! Your guild's fountain was taken by another guild, and your springs were lost as a result. Mine other springs to restore yield.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_bubble_des_4: As the season progresses, the max level of the Royal City Fountain has been increased to <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color>. Level it up now!
guild_sand_table.note_home_ore_null: No springs have been fully mined.
guild_sand_table.note_fort_ore_null: No springs have been fully mined.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_1: The <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring at <color=@000082>{0}</color> has reached 100% challenge progress. The production has started. Yield +<color=@000083>{2}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_2: The <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring at <color=@000082>{0}</color> has reached 100% challenge progress. Due to the mining queue being full, the <color=@000083>Lv.{2}</color> spring is replaced. Yield +<color=@000083>{3}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_3: The <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring at <color=@000082>{0}</color> has reached 100% challenge progress. Due to the mining queue being full and its level not exceeding that of the springs already in production, the yield remains unchanged.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_4: The grid at <color=@000082>{0}</color> has been occupied by another guild, and the <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring is lost. Yield -<color=@000084>{2}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_5: The grid at <color=@000082>{0}</color> has been occupied by another guild, and the <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring is lost. The previously halted <color=@000083>Lv.{2}</color> spring has resumed production. Yield -<color=@000084>{3}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_6: The <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color> spring in the Royal City has reached 100% challenge progress and started production. Yield +<color=@000083>{1}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_change_record_des_7: The <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color> spring in the Royal City has been leveled up to <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color>. Yield +<color=@000083>{2}</color>/round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_record_des_1: Successfully assisted with <color=@000082>{0}</color>'s <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring, increasing progress by <color=@000083>{2}</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_record_des_2: <color=@000082>{0}</color> assisted with my <color=@000083>Lv.{2}</color> spring at <color=@000082>{1}</color>, increasing progress by <color=@000083>{3}</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_chat_brother_help_my_ore: I'm trying to mine an <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color> spring in Clash Domain. Come assist me!
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_gst_over: This round of Clash Domain has ended.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_gst_settlement: Clash Domain is in settlement. Please try again later.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_owner_change: Fountain information has changed, and assistance is unavailable.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_member_leave: The member has left the guild, and assistance is unavailable.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_other_change: Fountain information has changed, and assistance is unavailable.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_help_max_time: Assistance limit reached for this spring.
guild_sand_table.tips_tech_level_item_des: After guild members donate enough resources, the corresponding tech skill will level up automatically.
guild_sand_table.note_tech_precondition_node_unable: Activate the previous node first: {0} Lv.{1}.
guild_sand_table.note_tech_all_level_unable: Requires total Clash Tech level to reach Lv.{0}.
guild_sand_table.note_tech_can_maxlevel: Resources are sufficient for max level. Please remind the administrators to upgrade.
guild_sand_table.nite_tech_donate_record_des: {1} donated Fountain Essence x{3} to Tech {2}.
guild_sand_table.note_strategy_no_permission: Only guild administrators can use this.
guild_sand_table.note_home_ore_level_des_1:
In the Royal City, adventurers have also discovered some springs, which can be mined by guild members.
(<color=@000083>{0}/{1}</color>: <color=@000083>{0}</color> spring(s) are currently being mined, with a maximum of <color=@000083>{1}</color> allowed to be mined simultaneously.)
guild_sand_table.note_home_ore_level_des_2:
Guild members have 4 Royal City Fountains and can level them up through challenges.
(Current level cap: <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color>, the highest value for this season.)
guild_sand_table.note_ore_occupy_success_des: <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color> spring has been mined, increasing the Fountain Essence yield.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_levelup_success_des: Royal City Fountain has been upgraded to <color=@000083>Lv.{0}</color>, increasing the Fountain Essence yield.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_producting_change_1:
The current limit allows up to <color=@000082>{0}</color> springs to be mined simultaneously.
Would you like to halt the mining of the lowest-level spring and begin mining a new one?
guild_sand_table.note_ore_producting_change_2:
The current limit allows up to <color=@000082>{0}</color> springs to be mined simultaneously.
Would you like to resume mining this spring?
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_list_des:
By challenging the Guardian Boss, you can help other guild members increase their progress.
(Each spring has a maximum of 3 assistance attempts.)
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_record_des_3: Successfully assisted with <color=@000082>{0}</color>'s <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring, increasing progress by <color=@000083>{2}</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_help_record_des_4: <color=@000082>{0}</color> assisted my <color=@000083>Lv.{1}</color> spring in the Royal City, increasing progress by <color=@000083>{2}</color>.
guild_sand_table.tips_chat_ore_help_own: You cannot assist your own fountain.
guild_sand_table.note_gst_tech_top_des: Donate Fountain Essence to level up techs used in the Guild War.
guild_sand_table.note_tech_donate_record_des: <color=@000082>{0}</color> donated Fountain Essence x<color=@000083>{2}</color> to Tech <color=@000083>{1}</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_add_npc_strategy_confirm_des: Confirm to use Rally Command? Remaining: {0}.
guild_sand_table.tips_gst_strategy_unable_guild_cell: Cannot be used on the Royal City.
guild_sand_table.tips_gst_strategy_unable_enemy_cell: Cannot be used on enemy grids.
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_1:
Reduces the CRIT Rate of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>. 
(Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_2:
Reduces the Physical DMG Boost of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>. 
(Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_3:
Reduces the Corrode damage of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>.
 (Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_4:
Reduces the chance of revival of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>.
 (Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_5:
Reduces the Reflect damage of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>.
 (Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_1_des_6:
Reduces the DMG RED of all enemies by <color=@000083>[0]</color>.
 (Effective only in Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_1:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Valiantors synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> .
 (Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_2:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Avengers synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> .
 (Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_3:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Glorians synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> .
 (Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_4:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Doomsdayers synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> . 
(Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_5:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Ethereals synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> .
 (Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tree_skill_2_des_6:
Increases the ATK, DEF, and Max HP of Mystifiers synergymates by <color=@000083>[0]</color> .
 (Effective only in Clash Domain and Alchemy Fountain)
guild_sand_table.tech_des_107101: Guild members' Fountain Essence yield is increased by [0] per round.
guild_sand_table.tech_des_107301:
The guild's Clash Skill - Rally Command usage limit is increased by [0] with each upgrade.
Rally Command: Use it on a grid occupied by your guild to station 30 defenders there. Only available to guild administrators.
guild_sand_table.tech_des_107401:
Guild members gain [0] reset item(s) for the Hope Tree with each upgrade.
(After upgrading, enter the Clash Tech interface to claim the rewards.)
guild_sand_table.tech_des_107501:
The mining limit for springs is increased by [0].
(Springs begin producing Fountain Essence every round once their challenge progress reaches 100%. Each player can mine up to 14 springs simultaneously. This limit can be increased by upgrading this tech.)
guild_sand_table.note_war_zone_match_des_5:
In this season's Clash Domain, <color=@000082>War Zones 1&2</color> will cross paths and compete with <color=@000082>War Zones 3&4</color> for glory.
Currently, server <color=@000082>{0}</color> belongs to <color=@000082>War Zones 1&2</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_war_zone_match_des_6:
In this season's Clash Domain, <color=@000082>War Zones 3&4</color> will cross paths and compete with <color=@000082>War Zones 1&2</color> for glory.
Currently, server <color=@000082>{0}</color> belongs to <color=@000082>War Zones 3&4</color>.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_num_des:
After the guild occupies a fountain, members can mine the springs within it.
(<color=@000083>{0}/{1}</color>: <color=@000083>{0}</color> spring(s) are currently being mined, with a maximum of <color=@000083>{1}</color> allowed to be mined simultaneously.)
guild_sand_table.note_ore_build_state_des_1: <color=@000083>Very Safe</color>: Enemy guilds cannot attack this location. The springs here are completely secure and can be mined without concern.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_build_state_des_2: <color=@000083>Temporarily Safe</color>: There are no enemy guild grids within one grid of this area. The springs here are safe for this round.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_build_state_des_3: <color=@000084>At Risk</color>: Enemy guild grids are present within one grid of this area. This location may be attacked during this round. It is recommended to occupy surrounding grids to secure the springs here.
guild_sand_table.note_ore_challenge_des: Challenge the Guardian Boss to increase the progress.
guild_sand_table.note_tech_donate_change_confirm_des: The guild administrators currently recommends the tech <color=@000082>{0}</color>. Would you like to proceed with the donation?
guild_sand_table.tips_tech_recommend_fail: The prerequisite for the current tech has not been activated.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_1: For each Ethereals synergymate deployed, the boss's CRIT Rate is reduced by 10%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_2: For each Valiantors synergymate deployed, the boss's Physical DMG Boost is reduced by 100%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_3: For each Mystifiers synergymate deployed, the boss's Corrode DMG is reduced by 100%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_4: For each Avengers synergymate deployed, the boss's chance of revival is reduced by 10%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_5: For each Doomsdayers synergymate deployed, the boss's Reflect DMG is reduced by 100%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_feature_des_6: For each Glorians synergymate deployed, the boss's DMG RED is reduced by 10%.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_1: The guardian here deals significant CRIT DMG. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's CRIT Rate.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_2: The guardian here deals significant PDMG. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's Physical DMG Boost.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_3: The guardian here deals significant Corrode DMG. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's Corrode DMG.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_4: The guardian here has a high chance of revival. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's chance of revival.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_5: The guardian here deals significant Reflect DMG. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's Reflect DMG.
guild_sand_table.ore_boss_tech_des_6: The guardian here has high DMG RED. Upgrading the corresponding Clash Tech will reduce the boss's DMG RED.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_team_change: The number of teams you can deploy is the same as the number of teams allowed in Clash Domain.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_team_confirm_1: Teams cannot be adjusted after the battle starts. Proceed?
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_team_confirm_2: Some teams are empty. Teams cannot be adjusted after the battle starts. Proceed?
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_self_add: You can choose a bonus effect after {0} more rounds.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_self_add_1: You can choose a bonus effect in the next round.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_box_reward: Total wins: {0}. Each win rewards 1 chest.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_rank_reward: Rank Rewards will be sent out after the {0}th Tournament is settled.
guild_sand_table.note_challenge_season_reward: Quest progress will reset at the end of the season.
guild_sand_table.tips_formation_empty: No teams deployed. Please deploy teams first.
guild_sand_table.challenge_buff_revive_des: Choose a fallen team to revive its heroes.
guild_sand_table.tips_challenge_review_empty: This is the first tournament. No previous information available.
guild_sand_table.tips_challenge_record_empty: No battles have been fought. No battle records available.
guild_sand_table.tips_challenge_guild_change: You are already participating in the current Tournament with another guild and will need to wait until the next round to join.
